no-restricted-syntax.message: This project uses color variables for our styling to keep everything consistent with a single, unifying pallette; if the feature you're working on is using colors, please import Colors and use those variables instead! (_variables.scss for color variables in scss, _exports.module.scss for color variables in .tsx)
